name: The Legend of Zeldo
description:
The Legend of Zeldo is a adventure game made during three weeks in september 2018, we made for the "Foire Internationale " in Montpellier.

The subject was to remake a game from the 80s, and we choose The Legend of Zelda.

The dead-line was only three weeks so we decided to do only one dungeon et a little part of exploration.

In this project i made the base character controller and i adapted the project for the presentation of the event. Also i did features about ennemies and the differents pick-up of the game.
